opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Charles H. Sylvain v. Priscilla S. Henderson, Estate of Eudore J. Sylvain

opinion:
459 U.S. 1004

103 S.Ct. 364

74 L.Ed.2d 399

Charles H. SYLVAIN, petitioner,
v.
Priscilla S. HENDERSON, Executrix, Estate of Eudore J. Sylvain

No. 82-280

Supreme Court of the United States

November 8, 1982

1

The motion of petitioner for leave to add party as respondent is denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of New Hampshire denied.
